LanguageData.VME_InstallFleshcraftedArm.label: install fleshcrafted arm
LanguageData.VME_InstallFleshcraftedArm.description: Install a fleshcrafted arm. This can be safely installed in colonists following a Fleshcrafting ideoligion, but will cause infections due to organ rejection in others.
